abstract: Kohlberg Kravis Roberts appointed Kaveh Samie as the managing director in charge  of its Middle East and North African unit.
snippet: Kohlberg Kravis Roberts appointed Kaveh Samie as the managing director in charge  of its Middle East and North African unit.
lead_paragraph: Kohlberg Kravis Roberts said Wednesday that it had appointed Kaveh Samie as the managing director in charge of its Middle East and North African unit.

headline.main: K.K.R. Taps Samie to Lead Mideast Unit
